Name: id
Description: Belvo's unique identifier for the current item.

Name: link
Description: The `link.id` the data belongs to.

Name: collected_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the data point was collected.

Name: created_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp of when the data point was created in Belvo's database.

Name: invoice_identification
Description: The fiscal institution's unique ID for the invoice.

Name: invoice_date
Description: The date of the invoice, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: status
Description:
The status of the invoice. Can be either *Vigente* (valid) or *Cancelado*
(cancelled).

Name: invoice_type
Description:
The fiscal institution's classification of the invoice.

For Mexico's SAT, we return one of the following values:

  - `Egreso`
  - `Ingreso`
  - `N贸mina`
  - `Pago`
  - `Traslado`

Name: type
Description:
The direction of the invoice (from the perspective of the Link owner).
- `OUTFLOW` indicates a sent invoice.
- `INFLOW` indicates a received invoice.

Name: tax_details
Description: General information about the taxes of the invoice.

Name: tax_details.total_tax_retained
Description: Total amount of retained taxes.

Name: tax_details.total_tax_transferred
Description: Total amount of transferred taxes.

Name: tax_details.retained_taxes
Description: List of retained taxes.

Name: tax_details.retained_taxes[].tax
Description: The type of retained tax (for example, ISR, IVA or IEPS).

Name: tax_details.retained_taxes[].tax_percentage
Description: The percentage of tax retained.

Name: tax_details.retained_taxes[].pre_tax_amount
Description: The amount before tax.

Name: tax_details.retained_taxes[].tax_amount
Description: The amount of retained tax.

Name: tax_details.transferred_taxes
Description: List of transferred taxes.

Name: tax_details.transferred_taxes[].tax
Description: The type of transferred tax (for example, ISR, IVA or IEPS).

Name: tax_details.transferred_taxes[].tax_percentage
Description: The percentage of tax transferred.

Name: tax_details.transferred_taxes[].pre_tax_amount
Description: The amount before tax.

Name: tax_details.transferred_taxes[].tax_amount
Description: The amount of transferred tax.

Name: sender_id
Description: The fiscal ID of the invoice sender

Name: sender_fiscal_regime
Description: The tax regime of the sender, as defined by the legal entity in the country.

Name: sender_name
Description: The name of the invoice sender.

Name: sender_tax_fraud_status
Description:
Indicates whether or not the sender is on SAT's tax fraud list for having submitted incorrect data, having outstanding payments, or having conducted business that is in violation of the fiscal institution's regulations.

SAT updates the tax fraud list every three months.

For more information regarding the reason's a taxpayer can be put on the tax fraud list, please see Article 69 and Article 69-B of Mexico's C贸digo Fiscal de la Federaci贸n.

Possible statuses are: - `INVESTIGATING`
The fiscal institution has identified irregularities and open an investigation regarding the taxpayer.
- `DISMISSED`
The fiscal institution has investigated the taxpayer and declared them innocent.
- `CONFIRMED`
The fiscal institution has confirmed that the taxpayer is guilty.
- `OVERTURNED`
The fiscal institution has reassessed a previously confirmed taxpayer and, based on new evidence, has taken the taxpayer off the tax fraud list.
- `NO_TAX_FRAUD_STATUS`
The receiver or sender is not found in the list (in other words, they are complying with the fiscal institution's regulations).

Name: receiver_id
Description: The fiscal ID of the invoice receiver.

Name: receiver_postal_code
Description: The postal code of the receiver.

Name: receiver_fiscal_regime
Description: The tax regime of the receiver, as defined by the legal entity in the country.

Name: receiver_name
Description: The name of the invoice receiver.

Name: receiver_tax_fraud_status
Description:
Indicates whether or not the receiver is on SAT's tax fraud list for having submitted incorrect data, having outstanding payments, or having conducted business that is in violation of the fiscal institution's regulations.

SAT updates the tax fraud list every three months.

For more information regarding the reason's a taxpayer can be put on the tax fraud list, please see Article 69 and Article 69-B of Mexico's C贸digo Fiscal de la Federaci贸n.

Possible statuses are: - `INVESTIGATING`
The fiscal institution has identified irregularities and open an investigation regarding the taxpayer.
- `DISMISSED`
The fiscal institution has investigated the taxpayer and declared them innocent.
- `CONFIRMED`
The fiscal institution has confirmed that the taxpayer is guilty.
- `OVERTURNED`
The fiscal institution has reassessed a previously confirmed taxpayer and, based on new evidence, has taken the taxpayer off the tax fraud list.
- `NO_TAX_FRAUD_STATUS`
The receiver or sender is not found in the list (in other words, they are complying with the fiscal institution's regulations).

Name: cancelation_status
Description: If the invoice is cancelled, this field indicates the status of the cancellation.

Name: cancelation_update_date
Description: The date of the invoice cancelation, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: certification_date
Description: The date of the fiscal certification, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: certification_authority
Description: The fiscal ID of the certification provider.

Name: payment_type
Description: The payment type code used for this invoice, as defined by the country legal entity. - 拆 Mexico SAT catalog reference article

Name: payment_type_description
Description: *This field has been deprecated. For more information regarding Belvo and deprecation, see our Deprecated fields explanation.*

Name: payment_method
Description: The payment method code used for this invoice, as defined by the legal entity of the country. - 拆 Mexico SAT catalog reference article. For Mexico, we return `PUE`, `PPD`, or `null`.

Name: payment_method_description
Description:
*This field has been deprecated. For more information regarding Belvo and deprecation, see our Deprecated fields explanation.*

*The description of the payment method used for this invoice.*

Name: usage
Description: The invoice's usage code, as defined by the legal entity of the country. - 拆 Mexico SAT catalog reference article

Name: version
Description: The CFDI version of the invoice.

Name: place_of_issue
Description: The postcode of where the invoice was issued.

Name: invoice_details
Description: A list of descriptions for each item (purchased product or service provided) in the invoice.

Name: invoice_details[].collected_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the data point was collected.

Name: invoice_details[].description
Description: The description of the invoice item (an invoice can have one or more items).

Name: invoice_details[].product_identification
Description: The identification code of the product or the service, as defined by the legal entity in the country.\n- \U0001F1F2\U0001F1FD Mexico.

Name: invoice_details[].quantity
Description: The quantity of this invoice item.

Name: invoice_details[].unit_code
Description: The unit of measure, as defined by the legal entity in the country. \n- \U0001F1F2\U0001F1FD Mexico SAT catalog reference.

Name: invoice_details[].unit_description
Description: The description of the item, as defined by the legal entity in the country.\n- \U0001F1F2\U0001F1FD Mexico SAT catalog reference.

Name: invoice_details[].unit_amount
Description: The price of one a singular item.

Name: invoice_details[].tax_type
Description: The item's tax type.

Name: invoice_details[].pre_tax_amount
Description: The total price for this item before tax is applied (`quantity` x `unit_amount`).

Name: invoice_details[].tax_percentage
Description: The tax percentage to apply.

Name: invoice_details[].tax_amount
Description: The amount of tax for this invoice item (`pre_tax_amount` x `tax_percentage`).

Name: invoice_details[].total_amount
Description: The total price for this invoice item (`pre_tax_amount` + `tax_amount`).

Name: invoice_details[].retained_taxes
Description: The retained tax on the invoice item.

Name: invoice_details[].retained_taxes[].collected_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the data point was collected.

Name: invoice_details[].retained_taxes[].tax
Description: The type of retained tax (for example, ISR, IVA or IEPS).

Name: invoice_details[].retained_taxes[].tax_percentage
Description: The percentage of tax retained.

Name: invoice_details[].retained_taxes[].retained_tax_amount
Description: The amount of retained tax.

Name: invoice_details[].transferred_taxes
Description: The transferred taxes related to the invoice.

Name: invoice_details[].transferred_taxes[].collected_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the data point was collected.

Name: invoice_details[].transferred_taxes[].tax
Description: The type of transferred tax (for example, ISR, IVA or IEPS).

Name: invoice_details[].transferred_taxes[].tax_percentage
Description: The percentage of tax transferred.

Name: invoice_details[].transferred_taxes[].transferred_tax_amount
Description: The amount of transferred tax.

Name: currency
Description:
The currency of the invoice. For example:
 
 - ю BRL (Brazilian Real)
 -  COP (Colombian Peso)
 - 拆 MXN (Mexican Peso)
 - 吼 USD (United States Dollar)

Name: subtotal_amount
Description: The pretax amount of this invoice (sum of each item's `pre_tax_amount`).

Name: exchange_rate
Description: The exchange rate used in this invoice for the currency.

Name: tax_amount
Description: The amount of tax for this invoice (sum of each item's `tax_amount`).

Name: discount_amount
Description: The total amount discounted in this invoice.

Name: total_amount
Description: The total amount of the invoice (`subtotal_amount` + `tax_amount` - `discount_amount`)

Name: related_invoices
Description: A list of related invoices.

Name: related_invoices[].relationship_type
Description: The type of relationship between this invoice and the related invoice, as defined by the legal entity in the country. For more information, see our SAT catalog reference article.

Name: related_invoices[].related_invoice_identification
Description: The SAT ID of the related invoice.

Name: payments
Description: A list detailing all the invoice payments.

Name: payments[].date
Description: ISO-8601 timestamp when the payment was made.

Name: payments[].payment_type
Description: Payment type code used for this invoice, as defined by the country's legal entity. - 拆 Mexico SAT catalog reference article

Name: payments[].currency
Description:
The currency of the payment. For example:

- ю BRL (Brazilian Real)
-  COP (Colombian Peso)
- 拆 MXN (Mexican Peso)

Please note that other currencies other than in the list above may be returned.

Name: payments[].exchange_rate
Description: The `currency` to MXN currency exchange rate when the payment was made.

Name: payments[].amount
Description: The invoice amount, in the currency of the original invoice.

Name: payments[].operation_number
Description: The fiscal institution's internal identifier for the operation.

Name: payments[].beneficiary_rfc
Description: The fiscal ID of the payment beneficiary.

Name: payments[].beneficiary_account_number
Description: The bank account number of the payment beneficiary.

Name: payments[].payer_rfc
Description: The fiscal ID of the payment issuer.

Name: payments[].payer_account_number
Description: The bank account number of the payment issuer.

Name: payments[].payer_bank_name
Description: The banking institution that was used by the payment issuer.

Name: payments[].related_documents
Description: A list of all the related deferred invoices affected by the payment.

Name: payments[].related_documents[].invoice_identification
Description: The fiscal institution's unique ID for the related deferred invoice.

Name: payments[].related_documents[].currency
Description:
The currency of the related invoice. For example:
    
- ю BRL (Brazilian Real)
-  COP (Colombian Peso)
- 拆 MXN (Mexican Peso)
  
  Please note that other currencies other than in the list above may be returned.

Name: payments[].related_documents[].payment_method
Description: The payment method of the related invoice.

Name: payments[].related_documents[].partiality_number
Description: The payment installment number.

Name: payments[].related_documents[].previous_balance
Description: The invoice amount before the payment.

Name: payments[].related_documents[].amount_paid
Description: The amount paid in this installment.

Name: payments[].related_documents[].outstanding_balance
Description: The amount remaining to be paid.

Name: payroll
Description: Details regarding the payroll payment. Only applicable for payroll invoices.

Name: payroll.days
Description: The number of days covered by the payment.

Name: payroll.type
Description: The payroll type, as defined by the legal entity of the country. - 拆 Mexico SAT catalog reference article

Name: payroll.amount
Description: The total amount of the payroll payment.

Name: payroll.version
Description: The version of the payroll object.

Name: payroll.date_from
Description: The start date of the payment period, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: payroll.date_to
Description: The end date of the payment period, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: payroll.collected_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the data point was collected.

Name: payroll.payment_date
Description: The payment date, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: payroll.periodicity
Description:
How often the payroll payment is made.

For Mexico's SAT, we return one of the following values:

  - `DAILY`
  - `WEEKLY`
  - `TENTH_DAY`
  - `FOURTEENTH_DAY`
  - `FIFTEENTH_DAY`
  - `MONTHLY`
  - `BIMONTHLY`
  - `PER_TASK`
  - `COMMISSION`
  - `ONE_OFF`
  - `OTHER_PERIODICITY`
Enum: DAILY, WEEKLY, TENTH_DAY, FOURTEENTH_DAY, FIFTEENTH_DAY, MONTHLY, BIMONTHLY, PER_TASK, COMMISSION, ONE_OFF, OTHER_PERIODICITY, null

Name: payroll.earnings_breakdown
Description: A breakdown of the earnings for the payroll payment.

Name: payroll.earnings_breakdown[].type
Description: The type of income. For a full list of possible values, please see the payroll earnings breakdown type table.

Name: payroll.earnings_breakdown[].taxable_amount
Description: The amount of the income that is taxable.

Name: payroll.earnings_breakdown[].vat_free_amount
Description: The amount of the income that is not subject to VAT.

Name: payroll.tax_deductions
Description: A breakdown of the tax deductions on the payroll payment.

Name: payroll.tax_deductions[].type
Description: The type of tax deduction. For a full list of possible values, please see the payroll tax deductions type table.

Name: payroll.tax_deductions[].amount
Description: The amount of the tax deduction.

Name: payroll.other_payments
Description: A breakdown of other payments for the payroll.

Name: payroll.other_payments[].type
Description: The type of other payment. For a full list of possible values, please see the payroll other payments type table.

Name: payroll.other_payments[].amount
Description: The amount of the other payment.

Name: folio
Description: The internal control number that the taxpayer assigns to the invoice.

Name: export_type
Description: The export type of the invoice, as defined by the legal entity in the country. For more information, see our SAT catalog reference article.

Name: xml
Description: XML of the invoice document.

Name: warnings
Description: Object containing information about any warnings related to this invoice.

Name: warnings.code
Description:
The warning code. Can be one of:

  - `sat_xml_limit_reached`
  - `sat_service_unavailable`
  - `null`

Name: warnings.message
Description:
The description of the warning. The message will depend on the warning code: `sat_xml_limit_reached`
The daily limit for XML downloads set by SAT was reached so this invoice might be missing data. Please check https://tinyurl.com/yydzhy5d for more information on this error. `sat_service_unavailable`
Downloading invoices details is not available. The SAT portal raised a 503 error.
Example:
The daily limit for XML downloads set by SAT was reached so this invoice
might be missing data. Please check https://tinyurl.com/yydzhy5d for more
information on this error.

Name: sender_blacklist_status
Description:
*This field has been deprecated. For more information regarding Belvo and deprecation, see our Deprecated fields explanation.*
Please use `sender_tax_fraud_status` instead.

Name: receiver_blacklist_status
Description:
*This field has been deprecated. For more information regarding Belvo and deprecation, see our Deprecated fields explanation.*
Please use `receiver_tax_fraud_status` instead.
